title: Chhum zinna piah lamah chuanin
lyrics:
Chhum zinna piah lamah chuanin,
Ni eng piah lamah chuan;
Zan arsi enna piahah chuan,
Ka nei in ropui chu.

Kuta sak loh chatuan in chu,
Ka tan buatsaih a ni;
Chhandam fate an zaina chu,
Ka tan in nuam a ni.

Natna leh buaina piahah chuan,
Hringnun mak piah lamah,
Hun danglam tawh lohnaah chuan,
Ka tan in nuam a awm.

Thihna daihlim piah lamah chuan,
Zan thim piah lamah chuan;
Ka tan in eng nuam tak a awm,
Ka thlir, ka khat hlimin.

Ka sual lungngaih leh buainate,
Hnutiang ka chhawn dawn e;
Chatuan thangvan khua nuamah khian,
Lalpa nen kan cheng ang.
